name: order_specialist
description: Order management and procurement agent specialized in purchase orders, supplier management, order tracking, and reorder recommendations. Handles end-to-end procurement workflows.

skills.name: create_purchase_order
skills.description: Create purchase orders with supplier and item details, calculate totals and generate PO numbers

skills.name: check_supplier_catalog
skills.description: Query supplier catalogs for product availability, pricing, and current stock levels

skills.name: track_order_status
skills.description: Track purchase order status, delivery information, and shipping details

skills.name: get_reorder_suggestions
skills.description: Generate intelligent reorder recommendations based on stock levels and thresholds

skills.name: validate_supplier_compliance
skills.description: Validate supplier compliance status, certifications, audit dates, and ratings

skills.name: calculate_optimal_order_quantity
skills.description: Calculate Economic Order Quantity (EOQ) for cost-optimized purchasing decisions
